page.title: 20CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Some children from our class such as karen, Moira, Lois and I play elastics The method of playing is that two children face each other with elastic bands round their ankles. Then someone jumps over the elastic bands which are stretched across. There are a number of different kinds of jumps. We sometimes play rounders and tig. We also play netball and my favourite games are rounders and elastics. I don't like netball very much. At home another game I like to play is exploring. Sometimes I ask my grandma if I can dig up the garden and investigate things that are underneath such as spiders, worms and pieces of pottery. Then I put them all back. Once I went to Howley with a friend and found lots of things. I brought them home but then I gave them away. {LYNSEY LOCKWOOD ST. MARY'S
